trans-unit.source: Represents a date selection range in a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um intervalo da seleção de datas em um controle de calendário mensal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> is the date or dates selected and highlighted on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> é a data ou datas selecionada e realçada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle.

trans-unit.source: If only one date is selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values will be equal.
trans-unit.target: Se apenas uma data é selecionada, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> os valores de propriedade serão iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> can be changed by the user clicking a date while dragging the mouse pointer across the desired dates, or you can set the range in code.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> pode ser alterado pelo usuário em uma data enquanto arrasta o ponteiro do mouse entre as datas desejadas, ou você pode definir o intervalo no código.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to have the user enter a date range into two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls or two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> controls and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> based on those dates.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você talvez queira que o usuário insira um intervalo de datas em duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controles ou dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> controles e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> com base nessas datas.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control based on two dates entered into two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle baseado em duas datas inseridas em dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controla quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes new instances of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Esse código supõe novas instâncias de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controlar, dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controles e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> foram criadas em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: You might consider adding code to validate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> assigned to the text boxes to verify that they contain valid dates.
trans-unit.target: Você pode considerar adicionar código para validar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> atribuído às caixas de texto para verificar se eles contêm datas válidas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> values are set to `null` when this constructor is used.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> valores são definidos como `null` quando este construtor é usado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties, and assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> objeto, define seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> propriedades e atribui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> o objeto para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are displayed in the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> é gerado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> valores de propriedade são exibidos nas caixas de texto.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que você tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> com dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controles, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle.

trans-unit.source: The existing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> existente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> class with the specified selection range.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> com o intervalo de seleção especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are assigned the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values of the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> valores de propriedade são atribuídos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> valores de propriedade de atribuída <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties, and assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> objeto, define seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> propriedades e atribui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> o objeto para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are displayed in the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> é gerado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> valores de propriedade são exibidos nas caixas de texto.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que você tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> com dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controles, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle.

trans-unit.source: The starting date in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: A data inicial no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: The ending date in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: A data de término no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> class with the specified beginning and ending dates.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> com as datas de início e término especificadas.

trans-unit.source: If the `lower`<xref:System.DateTime> value is greater than the `upper`<xref:System.DateTime> value, the `lower` value will be assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o `lower` <xref:System.DateTime> valor é maior que o `upper` <xref:System.DateTime> valor, o `lower` valor será atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> propriedade em vez do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control based on two dates entered into two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle baseado em duas datas inseridas em dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controla quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes new instances of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Esse código supõe novas instâncias de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controlar, dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controles e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> foram criadas em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: You might consider adding code to validate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> assigned to the text boxes to verify that they contain valid dates.
trans-unit.target: Você pode considerar adicionar código para validar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> atribuído às caixas de texto para verificar se eles contêm datas válidas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending date and time of the selection range.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data e a hora de término do intervalo de seleção.

trans-unit.source: The ending <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value of the range.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> de término do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties, and assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> objeto, define seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> propriedades e atribui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> o objeto para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are displayed in the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> é gerado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> valores de propriedade são exibidos nas caixas de texto.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que você tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> com dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controles, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting date and time of the selection range.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data e a hora de início do intervalo de seleção.

trans-unit.source: The starting <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value of the range.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> de início do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties, and assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> objeto, define seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> propriedades e atribui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> o objeto para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are displayed in the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> é gerado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> valores de propriedade são exibidos nas caixas de texto.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que você tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> com dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controles, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.ToString%2A> método retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que contém os valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> propriedades.
